item.title: Adding pie in ns2.35
item.description:
1. Either copy related “QUEUE/PIE” related settings to your ns-default file or replace your ns-default.tcl file with the attached [ns-default.tcl] (/ns2/ns-default.tcl).
  2. Put [pie.cc] (/ns2/pie.cc) and [pie.h] (/ns2/pie.h) file in ns-2.35/queue folder. you need to add [docsislink.cc] (/ns2/docsislink.cc) and [docsislink.h] (/ns2/docsislink.h) as well otherwise it will not compile.
  3. You have to add the following in your Makefile: queue/pie.o queue/docsislink.o
